1.text: Approximate the measure of your angle.

2.text: Place the origin over the center point, or vertex, of the angle you want to measure.

3.text: Rotate the protractor to align one leg of the angle with the baseline.

4.text: Follow the opposite leg of the angle up to the measurements on the protractor's arc.

6.text: Place the origin of the protractor at one end of the line.

7.text: Find the degree of the angle you wish to draw on the protractor's appropriate scale.

8.text: Draw the second leg to complete the angle.
